title: Stanislaw Lem - Mortal Engines
description:
These fourteen science fiction stories reveal Lem's fascination with artificial intelligence and demonstrate just how surprisingly human sentient machines can be. Written in the form of grotesque folk fairy tales, these stories about robot kings, robot dragons, and robot scientists are brought to life by Scott Aiello.

Stories:

01 The Tree Electroknights
02 Uranium Earpieces
03 How Erg The Self-inducting Slew A Paleface
04 Two Monsters
05 The White Death
06 How Microx And Gigant Made The Universe Expand
07 Tale Of The Computer That Fought A Dragon
08 The Advisers Of King Hydrops
09 Automatthew's Friend
10 King Globares And the Sages
11 The Tale Of King Gnuff
12 The Sanatorium Of Dr. Vliperdius
13 The Hunt
14 The Mask

Read by Scott Aiello
Format: MP3
Bitrate: 128 Kbps
Unabridged
Date: 27-AUG-2012
Provider: Audible Frontiers
Running Time: 8 h 33 min
